DOC.brief_summary: High level mannose-binding lectin ( MBL ) , activator part immune system call complement system , associate increase mortality risk early sign kidney damage patient type 2 diabetes . The effect weight loss change insulin resistance MBL level poorly elucidate . This study include 36 nondiabetic obese subject , receive low- calorie diet ( VLCD ) 800 kcal/day 8 week . Fasting blood sample obtain baseline 8 week VLCD concentration MBL , glucose insulin measure . Insulin resistance assess use HOMA-IR method .
